**gamble**


Features
--------

- dice
- (coming soon) cards

Usage
-----

Installation
^^^^^^^^^^^^

.. code-block:: bash

   pip install gamble

Basic Usage
^^^^^^^^^^^

.. code-block:: python

   import gamble
